# Invitation to Tender: Aerial Prescribed Burning and Rotary Wing Aircraft Rental

**Project Title:** RISO – Aerial Prescribed Burning and Rotary Wing Aircraft Rental

**Background:**

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) invites you to submit a proposal for a Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) contract for aerial prescribed burning and rotary wing aircraft rental services.

**Scope of Work:**

The selected contractor will be responsible for:

* Providing helicopter services for aerial prescribed burning, water bucketing, and other flight requirements for 5 CDSB Gagetown, Oromocto, New Brunswick.
* Supplying and operating all necessary equipment for aerial prescribed burning using helitorch and water bucketing.
* Maintaining equipment and performing inspections as required.

**Contract Terms and Conditions:**

* The contract will be on an as-and-when-required basis, from July 1, 2024 to June 30, 2026.
* The contractor must provide proof of Aviation Liability Insurance prior to award of this Standing Offer Agreement.

**Eligibility and Evaluation Criteria:**

Eligible contractors must be able to provide the required services and equipment. The evaluation criteria will be based on:

* Lowest price

**How to Participate:**

To participate, please visit the following website for more information and to access the solicitation document:
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19283520?extsite=MTkyODM1MjBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Closing Date and Time:**

April 17, 2024 at 2:00 PM (Eastern Time)

**Contact Information:**

For any questions or clarifications, please contact Timothy Beausoleil, Timothee Beausoleil2, at:
